    • deleteAppointmentsID

      public static void deleteAppointmentsID(int customerId, int appointmentId)

      Parameters:

      appointmentId - Appointment ID for appointment to delete

    • addAppointments

      public static void addAppointments(String appTitle, String appDescription, String appLocation, String appType, Timestamp appStartTime, Timestamp appEndTime, Timestamp appCreateDate, String appCreatedBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, String appLastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      Add new appointment to Database, Executes SQL Query to insert appointment table of Database with selected values
      Parameters:
      appTitle - Title of appointment to add
      appDescription - Description of appointment to add
      appLocation - Location of appointment to add
      appType - Type of appointment to add
      appStartTime - Start Time of appointment to add
      appEndTime - End Time of appointment to add
      appCreateDate - Create Date of appointment add
      appCreatedBy - Creator of appointment to add
      lastUpdate - Last Update Time of appointment to add
      appLastUpdatedBy - Last Updated By Creator of appointment to add
      customerId - Customer ID of appointment to add
      userId - User ID of appointment to add
      contactId - Contact ID of appointment to add

    • modifyAppointments

      public static boolean modifyAppointments(int appID, String appTitle, String appDescription, String appLocation, String appType, Timestamp appStartTime, Timestamp appEndTime, Timestamp lastUpdate, String appLastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      Update existing appointment with inputted values, Executes SQL Query to update existing appointment with values inputted in AppointmentsModify Screen of application
      Parameters:
      appID - Appointment ID of appointment to modify
      appTitle - Title of appointment to modify
      appDescription - Description of appointment to modify
      appLocation - Location of appointment to modify
      appType - Type of appointment to modify
      appStartTime - Start Time of appointment to modify
      appEndTime - End Time of appointment to modify
      lastUpdate - Last Update Time of appointment modify
      appLastUpdatedBy - Last Updated By Person of appointment to modify
      customerId - Customer ID of appointment to modify
      userId - User ID of appointment to modify
      contactId - Contact ID of appointment to modify
      Returns:
      return true if modify successful, return false if modify was not successful
